Reference

Output formats

Specify in your document’s YAML frontmatter to knit, or specify as the output_format with rmarkdown::render().

distill_article()

R Markdown format for Distill articles

distill_website()

R Markdown site generator for Distill websites

Create websites

create_website() create_blog()

Create a Distill website

Add and update blog posts

create_post()

Create a new blog post

import_post() update_post()

Import a post into a blog

Publish websites

publish_website()

Publish a Distill Website

Contents

distill is a part of rmarkdown.io, an ecosystem of packages for creating computational documents in R. Learn more at rmarkdown.io.

Developed by JJ Allaire, Rich Iannone, Yihui Xie. Site built with pkgdown.
